categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic awards

nodes.text: The Rebel Medal of Resolution was a Rebel badge awarded to individuals who managed to "defend the Alliance at the Battle of Restuss." It was slightly lower in rank than the Rebel Grand Medal of Resolution, awarded to individuals who directly defeated the Imperial occupying force during the battle.

The Rebel Medal of Resolution appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Because of the player-optional nature of the Battle of Restuss, it is unknown whether the medal was ever canonically issued.
